## Description {#details}

Lower @llvm.global&#95;dtors.

Implement @llvm.global&#95;dtors by creating wrapper functions that are registered in @llvm.global&#95;ctors and which contain a call to <code>&#95;&#95;cxa&#95;atexit</code> to register their destructor functions.

<SectionDefinition>
